barbie.name: Barbie Dreamhouse
barbie.bio: Barbie loves designing dream homes and creating spaces full of joy.

barbie.name: Barbie Mermaid
barbie.bio: As a mermaid, Barbie enjoys exploring the ocean and making friends with sea creatures.

barbie.name: Barbie Rockstar
barbie.bio: Barbie performs concerts worldwide, spreading love and music to all her fans.

barbie.name: Chef
barbie.bio: Barbie Chef creates delicious meals and loves hosting cooking classes for her friends.

barbie.name: Barbie Fashionista
barbie.bio: Barbie Fashionista is a style icon, always creating new trends and inspiring others.
